tasks.displayName: PowerShell Copy YAML to Deployment Repository/Folder

inputs.script:
# Write your PowerShell commands here.

Write-Host "Hello World"

name: Deploy Config Service Data
description: This task groups deploys Configuration Service data to the execution environment for the specified stage.
author: Brad Friedlander

inputs.name: localRepoFolder
inputs.label: localRepoFolder
inputs.helpMarkDown: This is the folder pathname for a local copy of the $(rep) repository.

inputs.name: repo
inputs.label: repo
inputs.helpMarkDown: This is the destination git repository.

inputs.name: scriptPath
inputs.label: scriptPath
inputs.helpMarkDown: Path of the script to execute. Must be a fully qualified path or relative to $(System.DefaultWorkingDirectory).

inputs.name: sourceFolder
inputs.label: sourceFolder
inputs.helpMarkDown: This is the source folder containing the configuration files.

inputs.name: StageName
inputs.label: StageName
inputs.helpMarkDown: This is the deployment stage name

instanceNameFormat: Task group: Deploy Config Service Data $(ASPNETCORE_ENVIRONMENT)
